name: Juicy Jumper
description:
A game made in Scratch, html, mac, and windows. Very juicy! This game only works on PC as of now. Make sure also to check out my youtube channel

THIS GAME HAS SOME BUGS

Touch the blue glowing rectangle to gain points, and avoid the explosive yellow bombs falling down at you!

INSTRUCTIONS (keyboard):
  • WASD/Arrows
  • Space to DASH
INSTRUCTIONS (controller):
  • Joystick L (left and right)
  • X PlayStation, B Nintendo Switch, A Xbox, etc. (Jump)
  • O PlayStation, A Nintendo Switch, B Xbox, etc. (Dash)
